Lone Wolf provides player characters the following benefits:

+[1] additional Action charge(s)
+[2] additional Bonus Action charge(s)
+[3] additional Reaction charge(s)
Increased hit points by [4]% + Level x 2
Increased carrying capacity by [5]%
+[6] bonus to attack rolls
+[7] bonus to spell save DC
+[8] bonus to saving throws
+[9] bonus to skill checks
+[10] to AC
[11]+SpellCastAbility added to Cantrip damage
[12] Bonus spell damage
All resources will replenish on short rest
Wild Shape charges will replenish every combat
This mode was inspired by a similar mode from Divinity: Original Sin 2 and intended for solo play.
